description: Although he acts like the other boys, he seems to be the least talkative and his voice sounds slightly more mature than the other boys. Butch`s hair style resembles the original Butch`s first hair style, although Butch`s bangs in this version are longer and usually cover his right eye. Butch`s skin is much paler than his brothers and his eyes are slightly longer and more "Asian" looking. Butch`s weapon is Kaoru`s smelly sweat sock, which he uses as a boomerang, he keeps his weapon in his shoe[thats why it gets smellier everytime]. The sock emits its odor when thrown. He is represented by a diamond.
name: Butch
